name: Stray Roads
description:
THIS IS ONLY A PROTOTYPE!  Many things will change. No gameplay progression can be made as of yet. The phone can't be answered. The monster can't be killed. I upload this here to get feedback on art style, controls, performance and bugs. If you intend to download it, please comment below after playing.

---

STORY

You're a man with amnesia who just woke up in a forest. There is a crashed motorcycle nearby, and you've found yellow scarf laying around. Your consciousness ebbs and flows. Is it dream or reality? Retrace your steps into nearby town, find out what happened, who you are, and avoid getting framed in recently committed crime.  

CONTROLS

WASD - movement
E - pick up item
SHIFT - run
SPACE - zoom in/focus on character
ESC - inventory screen
F4 - toggle fullscreen/windowed mode
F5 - toggle dithering
F6 - toggle chromatic aberration
